newsitem.title: UK: NWE gasoline rise on back of firmer crude.
newsitem.headline: NWE gasoline rise on back of firmer crude.

text.p: NWE oil products were mixed on Tuesday, traders said.
Gas oil spreads were steady on good short-term buying, while IPE July gas oil closed $2.50 a tonne firmer at $167.75.
Gasoline rose $3 a tonne on firmer crude and tightness for prompt Rotterdam supply. Barges were talked at $189 fob Rotterdam.
High sulphur fuel oil barges moved up to the highest trading range on Monday, changing hands at $85 fob ARA after earlier trades at $84.75 and $84.50.
